meanings.definition: A person who earns wages for work performed.
meanings.sent1: The wageworker received their paycheck at the end of the week.
meanings.sent2: The wageworker clocked in at the factory every morning.
meanings.sent3: The wageworker joked that their wallet was getting heavier with all the wages.
meanings.sent4: The wageworker was the backbone of the company, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The wageworker's dedication to their job was truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: She decided to wageworker at the local store to earn some extra money.
meanings.sent2: They wageworker diligently to support their family.
meanings.sent3: He wageworker happily, knowing his efforts were appreciated.
meanings.sent4: The team wageworkered together to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent5: Wageworkering allowed her to save up for a dream vacation.
